channel.title: Comments on: No One Reads My Blog Anyway

item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: no problems logging on today(Monday.) Thanks for including "Ringraziamento."
item.content:encoded: no problems logging on today(Monday.) Thanks for including “Ringraziamento.”

item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: I had some difficulty getting into your blog this a.m. Could not enter as I usually do (from my toolbar.) Googled "machaggis" and your sire immediately came up but I was unable to enter that way either. Got here through "bluefaced pixie."
item.content:encoded:
I had some difficulty getting into your blog this a.m.
Could not enter as I usually do (from my toolbar.) Googled “machaggis” and your sire immediately came up but I was unable to enter that way either. Got here through “bluefaced pixie.”
